attributes.action: Encourage schools to link up with outside sports clubs
attributes.additional_details: The decline of British sport could be stopped by schools linking up with outside sports clubs. Whyy cannot schools have a running club link to a local athletics club and a school football team linked to the to the the local footbal teams. It would take co-operation from schools but many outside club need youngters to join and would be willing to help. It would aid in the obesity problem.
